price: Kuma idan kun ƙidãya ni'imar Allah, bã ku iya lissafa ta. Lalle ne Allah, haƙĩƙa, Mai gãfara ne, Mai jin ƙai.
arabic: وَإِن تَعُدُّواْ نِعۡمَةَ ٱللَّهِ لَا تُحۡصُوهَآۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَغَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-in taʿuddū niʿ'mata al-lahi lā tuḥ'ṣūhā inna al-laha laghafūrun raḥīmun
